metadata.name: HackTool - SOAPHound Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of SOAPHound, a .NET tool for collecting Active Directory data, using specific command-line arguments that may indicate an attempt to extract sensitive AD information.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --buildcache ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --bhdump ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --certdump ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --dnsdump '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --cachefilename ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -o ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --outputdirectory'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of SOAPHound, a .NET tool for collecting Active Directory data, using specific command-line arguments that may indicate an attempt to extract sensitive AD information.
